items.badge_description: After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 305 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 62!

We love lagers! Crisp, clean, cold fermenting, these beers are a labor of love. Whether a dark Dunkel, a malty amber, or a light helles, lagers never fail us. So on Lager Day, join us in a toast to the humble lager.

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 10 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 3!

Kiwis, rugby and sheep aren’t the only things New Zealand has to offer. There’s a ton of great beers in a variety of styles just waiting for you to explore! That's 30 different beers from a brewery in New Zealand. Try 5 more for Level 7.

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 375 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 76!

user.bio: Warwickshire cricket fan,Bromsgrove Sporting supporter,Rugby League afficianado & beer geek AKA Dudley Dave,Pop-up Dave
Life's Too Short To Drink Crap Beer, Season Ticket Holder At Warrington Rugby League Club Once a Wire Always a Wire.
Enjoying exploring the world, one beer at a time!

items.badge_description: Kiwis, rugby and sheep aren’t the only things New Zealand has to offer. There’s a ton of great beers in a variety of styles just waiting for you to explore! That's 10 different beers from a brewery in New Zealand. Try 5 more for Level 3.

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 5 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 2!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 375 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 76!
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 170 check-ins with a photo.

items.checkin_comment: Waterig en bitter. Niet het beste bier.

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 90 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 19!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 105 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 22! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
